start: ^I am Another Wor Magic School 2nd grade Class 4! Today is a fun vacation day. I was on my way home with my bag on my back.
^However, while all the teachers were there, only teacher Basil was not seen. What a strange thing to do... It's hard not to notice the shining face.
^Oh, by the way, teacher Basil is teaching me alchemy !
^Originally, school doesn't teach alchemy, but I've been learning it since I happened to see the teacher's alchemy. It's a lot more fun than magic. :)
^I wanted to say hello to my teacher and go home... Where did teacher go? While I was questioning, a very, very surprising situation unfolded!
^A small voice was heard somewhere. The source of the voice was a  Mouse doll hanging from my bag.
^It's a doll that was always near you, but since when did it start hanging there? No, but why are you talking???
^" I'm basically your assistant! It's a mouse! "
^It was embarrassing. By the way, did you name it Mouse because it looks like a mouse? You're too mean... :(
^" Help my master! Someone took the master as the basis!!!"
^" Fortunately, if you track down the union method you created, you'll know where you are! "
^" Help me get my master back!!! "
^The mouse murmured. I can't believe someone took you! It's still shocking... At that time, I

c-0: ^. There are a lot of things to do during vacation! And I couldn't believe it.
^However, after the mouse's persuasion, teacher found out that the story was true and decided to save the teacher.
c-1: ^. I can't believe you're gone.. I can't believe I can't see that face like a national treasure again!!! I can't do that. I'll find it no matter what.

intro: ^So I decided to go on a journey to save my teacher. During the vacation, for 30 days!
^What kind of adventure awaits? My heart is pounding!
